header_tagline: Fix ZIP Mojibake in Your Browser
header_description: Use this tool before distributing a ZIP file, or when a ZIP file cannot be extracted successfully.
step1_info: Most encrypted ZIP files can be processed without a password, but strongly encrypted files cannot be processed. All processing happens in your browser to protect your privacy.
step1_file_placeholder: Click to select or drag & drop a ZIP file
compatibility_ascii_only: All files are ASCII. Most ZIP tools will handle this archive correctly.
compatibility_ascii_only_with_flag: All files are ASCII with UTF-8 flag. Most ZIP tools will handle this archive correctly.
compatibility_utf8_only: All files have UTF-8 flag. Most ZIP tools will handle this archive correctly.
compatibility_no_utf8_flag: Some files are missing UTF-8 flags. We recommend conversion to add UTF-8 flags for best compatibility.
compatibility_other: Non-UTF-8 encoding detected. We recommend converting to UTF-8 encoding with flags for best compatibility.
compatibility_broken: Archive appears to be broken or is not a valid ZIP file.
step2_encoding_force_note: Force mode will override auto-detection and UTF-8 flags
step2_field_selection_note: Controls which ZIP fields are used for filenames. Unicode extra fields (0x7075) are preferred when available.
step2_field_cdh_unicode_lfh_unicode_cdh: CDH Unicode → LFH Unicode → CDH Filename (Recommended)
step2_field_cdh_unicode_lfh_unicode_lfh: CDH Unicode → LFH Unicode → LFH Filename
step2_field_lfh_unicode_cdh_unicode_cdh: LFH Unicode → CDH Unicode → CDH Filename
step2_field_lfh_unicode_cdh_unicode_lfh: LFH Unicode → CDH Unicode → LFH Filename
step2_ignore_errors: Ignore decoding errors and create ZIP file anyway
step3_description: Click the button below to download the converted ZIP file with corrected metadata.
step3_os_metadata_detected_description: The selected ZIP file appears to contain OS-specific metadata files (e.g., __MACOSX folder or Thumbs.db files). You can remove these files from the converted ZIP file if desired.
footer_privacy_text: All processing is done locally in your browser. No files are uploaded.
